short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a keyboard that when played, frogs float up. Also works with external midi-enabled devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a keyboard to any page that when played, frogs float up. Also works with external midi-enabled devices. Learn notes through color-coded frogs.
